rukus.text: Gxi ne fakt est ke tie temp when human est nothing est est al menci
Ni kre human liquid mixture el 2 parents en ord test him! Tiel ni far him hearer seer
Ni montr him 2 paths tiam li est either appreciative unappreciative
Ni prepar disbelievers cxen shackles blazing Infer
As por virtuous ili trink tas spic nektar
Risort rezerv di servants; gxi sxpruc out as ili testament
Ili fulfill their pledges reverence tag est extremely difficult
Ili donac their favorite food poor orf captive
Ni feed vi DI; ni ne expect rekompenc vi nor dank
Ni tim our Lord tag est plen da mizer trouble
Consequently DI protekt them evils ke tag rekompenc them joy contentment
Li rekompenc them por their steadfastness Paradise silk
Ili relax therein luxurious furnishings. Ili sufer nek hejt sun nor any cold
shade kovr them therein frukt brought within reach
Ili serv trink argxent uj tas ke est translucent
Translucent tas kvankam far argxent; ili rightly ind all this
Ili gxu drink delicious flavors
El risort therein kon Salsabeel
Serv them est immortal servants! When vi seg them ili jen scattered perl
Wherever vi rigard vi seg bliss wonderful dominion
Sur them est vest de verd velur satin argxent ornaments Their Lord proviz them pur drink
This est rekompenc awaits vi your efforts sxat
